title: Drawing, Design for Cabinet in Mahogany and Inlay with Cup and Saucer Atop, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Cabinet in Mahogany and Inlay with Cup and Saucer Atop
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right of sheet: Cabinet of Mahogany and Inlay
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Retangular body with 2 doors decorated with one oval patera medallion center; raised on 4 straight, slightly tapering legs; tall cubboard atop with glass doors and china  plates and cups inside; cup and saucer on right of lower cabinet.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Cabinet in Mahogany and Inlay with Cup and Saucer Atop, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-209
